name: Kira's Legacy
description:
Kira's Legacy is an RPG game set in the Kingdom of Tranquil. 

Aldis, a young resident of Serenity Town, and his sister, Kira, find that life isn't always as it seems. An old legend which has been passed down from generation to generation finally becomes reality. 

Fight through Forests and Dungeons and solve multiple puzzles in order to stop the Evil Queen Mara, and hopefully save your sister. 

On your journey you will meet many interesting characters, some of which will aid you on your journey. Merchants and Inns in each town will ensure you have the right equipment before heading out into the wilderness where danger lurks around every corner.

Will you fight on and stop the Evil Queen Mara? Or will you fall at the last hurdle and let her destroy everything you ever loved?

The fate of the world rests on your shoulders!
